name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in troubleshooting and preventative maintenance across biomedical, electrical, and mechanical systems. I possess strong customer service and communication skills that enhance client engagement and satisfaction. My technical proficiency includes extensive knowledge of **Windows**, **Networking**, and **Database** systems, allowing me to effectively analyze and resolve complex issues.

In addition to my core skills, I bring a proven track record in building high-performance solutions with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My development experience encompasses cloud services with **Azure** and **AWS**, and I have successfully led projects that integrate AI/ML capabilities for innovative solutions. My background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation supports the delivery of secure applications compliant with industry standards.
